369730.name: Zeuxis : procedural texture generator Demo
369730.description:
No need to be an artist. Create nice textures in a few minutes.
This software allows you to create textures by combining basic operators.
You stack operators in a hierarchical fashion to get a result.

Simple and fast UI.
128bit internal resolution to prevent loss of higher range when combining effects.

The projects created with the demo are compatible with the full product.

Limitations:
  • English only, no UNICODE support for filenames (when saving/loading), only basic ASCII.
  • The UI is not customizable, i.e. font, font color, font size, window color.
  • The image format is TGA or TIFF when exporting ( Export is disabled in demo ).
